entry.title: Sunday: Freezing rain mixed with snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Freezing rain and flurries. Wind north 30 km/h. Temperature steady near zero. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Freezing rain and a few flurries ending this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or freezing rain. Wind north 30 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
